registrationOptionalParams.description: Registration parameters provided for a CBSD

___cbsdInfo.description: Container for optional information related to the CBSD hardware and software configuration.

___firmwareVersion.description: Name of the CBSD firmware version.

___hardwareVersion.description: Name of the CBSD hardware version.

___softwareVersion.description: Name of the CBSD software version.

___cpiSignatureData.description: Container for optional information related to the CBSD CPI information.

___cbsdCategory.description: A if the device is Category A; B if it is Category B

___installationParam.description: Air interface parameter for a CBSD

___eirpCapability.description: Maximum EIRP of the CBSD in units of dBm/10MHz.

___antennaAzimuth.description: Heading of antenna azimuth relative to true north, provided in decimal degrees. Positive indicates easterly.

___antennaGain.description: Maximum gain in dB of the antenna along the boresight

___indoorDeployment.description: True if the equipment is installed indoors, false if outdoors

___longitude.description: Longitude in WGS84 coordinates, provided in decimal degrees

___verticalAccuracy.description: A measurement in meters of the vertical accuracy of the indicated location.

___antennaDowntilt.description: Downtilt of the antenna (vertically down is positive) in decimal degrees.

___antennaBeamwidth.description: Beamwidth to 3dB points of the antenna coverage pattern, provided in decimal degrees and measured at the horizon. A value of 360 indicates an omni-directional antenna.

___latitude.description: Latitude in WGS84 coordinates, provided in decimal degrees

___height.description: Height of CBSD antenna, provided in meters. See heightType for interpretation.

___horizontalAccuracy.description: A measurement in meters of the horizontal accuracy of the indicated location.

___antennaModel.description: If an external antenna is used, the model of the antenna is optionally provided in this field.

___heightType.description: The reference for the height parameter. AMSL indicates the height is measured relative to mean sea level. AGL indicates the height is measured relative to local ground level at latitude, longitude.

___callSign.description: The call sign for the operator. Meaning and origin TBD

___userId.description: Unique user designator for the operator. Generation mechanism TBD

___fccId.description: The certification FCC ID for the hardware

___cbsdSerialNumber.description: Unique identifier for the CBSD chosen by the manufacturer

___measCapability.description: List of supported sensing capabilities of the device
